sentences.en: A police dog picked up the murderer's scent.
sentences.cn: 一只警犬嗅出了凶手的气味。

sentences.en: Everything after the discovery of the murderer was anticlimactic.
sentences.cn: 找到谋杀者之后,人们对所有事情的兴趣都突减了.

sentences.en: How long should a murderer be kept in prison?
sentences.cn: 犯了谋杀罪的人应在监狱关多少年?

sentences.en: The judge sentenced the murderer to death.
The murderer came out of the hotel room red - handed.
sentences.cn: 凶手从旅馆房间出来时手上沾满鲜血.

sentences.en: The murderer may well come from the estate.
sentences.cn: 凶手很可能来自那个庄园。

sentences.en: The murderer thrust a dagger into her heart.
sentences.cn: 凶手将匕首刺进她的心脏.

sentences.en: The murderer was apparently mentally disturbed.
sentences.cn: 该杀人犯显然精神失常。
那个杀人犯完全是丧心病狂.

sentences.en: The murderer was executed in a gas chamber.
The murderer was put to death.
The murderer was sent to the gallows for his crimes.
sentences.cn: 谋杀犯由于罪大恶极被处以绞刑.

sentences.en: The murderer's entreaties for mercy availed to nothing.
sentences.cn: 无人理会杀人犯的求饶.

sentences.en: They discovered the murderer to have run away.
sentences.cn: 他们发现凶手已逃之夭夭.

sentences.en: You're nothing less than a murderer!

words.tran_cn: 杀人的，残忍的；凶残的；蓄意谋杀的
